Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: Thanks for raising this ~ryjones I made sure I removed gerrit references and we published a beta last night which doesn't seem to to have fixed it. Do you know which release npm pays attention to for that link, by any chance?

Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: Ok, think I know what it is. We're missing the directory property: https://docs.npmjs.com/files/package.json#repository because we've got a few modules in one repo - I'll try to fixing that

Action.author: ryjones
Action.body: Date: Fri Nov 29 14:18:26 2019 +0000 (Release-1.4) Remove gerrit/jenkins references (#49) Signed-off-by: heatherlp but it is quite a few changes after the 1.4.4 tag, which points here: commit 5491a53b647a378aa0cfbffb5539f567e2850156 Merge: bb2d9aeb 5cda9597 Author: Andrew Coleman Date: Mon Jul 1 10:23:14 2019 +0000 Merge " FABN-1251 Added start/end block functionality" into release-1.4 I suspect adding a 1.4.5 tag and shipping that as "latest" would fix it >

Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: You were right! The links have been fixed :) closing this off

Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: The links were fixed by releasing 1.4.5
